<ln l="1536" t="12542" r="6034" b="12701" baseLine="12665">
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="-9" scale="1050">
<wd l="1536" t="12542" r="1670" b="12662">If</wd>
<space/>
<wd l="1690" t="12542" r="2026" b="12667">there</wd>
<space/>

<space/>
